Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add mobile keyboard detection for Messages and Arturito

- Messages: Add setupMobileKeyboardDetection\(\) using Visual Viewport API
- Messages CSS: Use 100dvh/100svh for dynamic viewport, sticky input area
- Arturito Widget CSS: Update to use 100dvh, sticky positioning, env\(safe-area-inset-bottom\)
- Arturito Full Page: Add keyboard detection JS and update CSS with modern viewport units

Ensures input stays visible above keyboard on iOS/Android devices.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Arturito mobile input positioning and cursor color

- Reduce padding when keyboard open for closer input to keyboard
- Set caret-color to green \(#3ecf8e\) to match theme
- Add overflow:hidden to prevent elements showing outside input area
- Disable iOS tap highlight for cleaner appearance

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
